titleStmt.title: The picture of Independency lively (yet lovingly) delineated. By John Vicars.
titleStmt.author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock at Adling-hill, and are to be sold by Michael Spark junior in Green Arbour.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 15th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
